rows.label: tev000301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Come on, you gotta take me with you.
I have to see the Lifehold with my own eyes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Lao to your team.

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Lao's request for now.

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0004
rows.name:
I knew I could count on you. You can count on me,
tooâ€”I won't slow you down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0005
rows.name: Come on, don't be like that. Reconsider, will you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Say, you're that one from Elma's team, right?
[ST:playername ], was it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0007
rows.name: How are things going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0008
rows.name:
If you have any interesting missions on your plate,
maybe throw me into the mix? I can spare a moment
from my grueling schedule of thumb twiddling.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0031
rows.name: Add Lao to your team.

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline Lao's request for now.

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Couldn't ask for a better way to kill some time.
Lead the way, boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Seriously? Well, if you don't need me, I'm not gonna
twist your arm. Stay safe out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0015
rows.name:
The enemy of our enemy is our friend, right?
Hopefully it'll be just that simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0016
rows.name:
But when you're dealing with unknown xenos,
it's best to watch your back all the same.
So maybe you'll take me along to do just that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Lao to your team.

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Lao's request for now.

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0017
rows.name:
Great. Leave this to me. Whatever needs doing,
I'm your man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Whatever you say, boss. You change your mind,
I'll still be here doing jack squat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0023
rows.name:
I just heard Irina's team got hit by the Ganglion.
Dammit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Well, all we can do is get our butts down to Oblivia
and try to save theirs. You'll take me along, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Lao to your team.

rows.label: tev000301_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000301_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Lao's request for now.

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0025
rows.name:
You bet your butt I'll tag along! Whatever needs doing,
I'm your man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0026
rows.name:
All right then. If you decide you could use a hand,
just let me know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0031
rows.name: Good luck. I'll do what I can from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000301_MSG0032
rows.name: You go on ahead without me, all right?[ST:wait ]
